metadata.title: CVE-2022-1111 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A business logic error in Project Import in GitLab CE/EE versions 14.9prior to 14.9.2, 14.8 prior to 14.8.5, and 14.0 prior to 14.7.7 undercertain conditions caused imported projects to show an incorrect user inthe 'Access Granted' column in the project membership pages

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
